snippet: The American Psychiatric Association’s board has approved the fifth edition of the association’s diagnostic manual, ending more than five years of controversy.
abstract: American Psychiatric Association's board has approved fifth edition of association's diagnostic manual, following five years of acrimony and tense compromise; some psychiatrists have opposed many of the changes, which seek to alter how mental disorders are conceived.
lead_paragraph: The American Psychiatric Association’s board has approved the fifth edition of the association’s diagnostic manual, ending more than five years of controversy.

headline.seo: A Compromise on Defining and Diagnosing Mental Disorders
headline.main: A Tense Compromise on Defining Disorders
headline.print_headline: A Tense Compromise On Defining Disorders

keywords.value: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (Book)
